n_eval_reconstruction_batches.description: Number of evaluation batches for reconstruction metrics
n_eval_reconstruction_batches.title: Reconstruction Batches

n_eval_sparsity_variance_batches.description: Number of evaluation batches for sparsity and variance metrics
n_eval_sparsity_variance_batches.title: Sparsity Variance Batches

index.description: Index of the feature in the SAE
index.title: Feature Index

feature_density.description: Proportion of tokens that activate each feature
feature_density.title: Feature Density

consistent_activation_heuristic.description: Average number of tokens per prompt that activate each feature
consistent_activation_heuristic.title: Consistent Activation Heuristic

encoder_bias.description: Bias terms in the encoder for each feature
encoder_bias.title: Encoder Bias

encoder_norm.description: L2 norm of encoder weights for each feature
encoder_norm.title: Encoder Norm

encoder_decoder_cosine_sim.description: Cosine similarity between encoder and decoder weights for each feature
encoder_decoder_cosine_sim.title: Encoder-Decoder Cosine Similarity

model_behavior_preservation.description: Metrics related to how well the SAE preserves model behavior
model_behavior_preservation.title: Model Behavior Preservation

model_performance_preservation.description: Metrics related to how well the SAE preserves model performance
model_performance_preservation.title: Model Performance Preservation

reconstruction_quality.description: Metrics related to how well the SAE reconstructs the original activation
reconstruction_quality.title: Reconstruction Quality

shrinkage.description: Metrics related to how the SAE changes activation magnitudes
shrinkage.title: Shrinkage

sparsity.description: Metrics related to feature activation sparsity
sparsity.title: Sparsity

token_stats.description: Statistics about the number of tokens used in evaluation
token_stats.title: Token Statistics

kl_div_score.description: Normalized KL divergence score comparing model behavior with and without SAE
kl_div_score.title: KL Divergence Score

kl_div_with_ablation.description: KL divergence when the activation is ablated
kl_div_with_ablation.title: KL Divergence with Ablation

kl_div_with_sae.description: KL divergence when using the SAE reconstruction
kl_div_with_sae.title: KL Divergence with SAE

ce_loss_score.description: Normalized cross entropy loss score comparing model performance with and without SAE
ce_loss_score.title: Cross Entropy Loss Score

ce_loss_with_ablation.description: Cross entropy loss when the activation is ablated
ce_loss_with_ablation.title: CE Loss with Ablation

ce_loss_with_sae.description: Cross entropy loss when using the SAE reconstruction
ce_loss_with_sae.title: CE Loss with SAE

ce_loss_without_sae.description: Base cross entropy loss without any intervention
ce_loss_without_sae.title: CE Loss without SAE

explained_variance.description: Proportion of variance in the original activation explained by the SAE reconstruction
explained_variance.title: Explained Variance

mse.description: Mean squared error between original activation and SAE reconstruction
mse.title: Mean Squared Error

cossim.description: Cosine similarity between original activation and SAE reconstruction
cossim.title: Cosine Similarity

l2_norm_in.description: Average L2 norm of input activations
l2_norm_in.title: Input L2 Norm

l2_norm_out.description: Average L2 norm of reconstructed activations
l2_norm_out.title: Output L2 Norm

l2_ratio.description: Ratio of output to input L2 norms
l2_ratio.title: L2 Ratio

relative_reconstruction_bias.description: Measure of systematic bias in the reconstruction
relative_reconstruction_bias.title: Relative Reconstruction Bias

l0.description: Average number of non-zero feature activations
l0.title: L0 Sparsity

l1.description: Average sum of absolute feature activations
l1.title: L1 Sparsity

total_tokens_eval_reconstruction.description: Total number of tokens used in reconstruction evaluation
total_tokens_eval_reconstruction.title: Total Tokens (Reconstruction)

total_tokens_eval_sparsity_variance.description: Total number of tokens used in sparsity and variance evaluation
total_tokens_eval_sparsity_variance.title: Total Tokens (Sparsity/Variance)

description: The output of core SAE evaluations measuring reconstruction quality, sparsity, and model preservation.

eval_id.description: A unique UUID identifying this specific eval run
eval_id.title: ID

datetime_epoch_millis.description: The datetime of the evaluation in epoch milliseconds
datetime_epoch_millis.title: DateTime (epoch ms)

eval_result_metrics.description: The metrics of the evaluation, organized by category. Define your own categories and the metrics that go inside them.
eval_result_metrics.title: Result Metrics Categorized

eval_result_details.description: Detailed metrics for each feature in the SAE
eval_result_details.title: Feature-wise Metrics

sae_bench_commit_hash.description: The commit hash of the SAE Bench that ran the evaluation.
sae_bench_commit_hash.title: SAE Bench Commit Hash

sae_lens_id.description: The ID of the SAE in SAE Lens.
sae_lens_id.title: SAE Lens ID

sae_lens_release_id.description: The release ID of the SAE in SAE Lens.
sae_lens_release_id.title: SAE Lens Release ID

sae_lens_version.description: The version of SAE Lens that ran the evaluation.
sae_lens_version.title: SAE Lens Version

eval_result_unstructured.description: Optional. Any additional outputs that don't fit into the structured eval_result_metrics or eval_result_details fields. Since these are unstructured, don't expect this to be easily renderable in UIs, or contain any titles or descriptions.
eval_result_unstructured.title: Unstructured Results

title: Core SAE Evaluation
